channel.title: Commandline client for Curseforge
channel.description: Recent content on Commandline client for Curseforge

item.title: Building
item.description: As this project is built with Go you need to install Go first. The installation of Go is out of the scope of this document, please follow the official documentation. After the installation of Go you need to get the sources: git clone https://github.com/webhippie/cursecli.git cd cursecli/ All required tool besides Go itself are bundled by Go modules, all you need is part of the Makfile: make generate build Finally you should have the binary within the bin/ folder now, give it a try with .

item.title: License
item.description: This project is licensed under the Apache 2.0 license. For the license of the used libraries you have to check the respective sources.
